title: Silly Ideas Guy

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Convert another player into the role whose post number is the 24-hour time in the host's timezone when this ability resolves (for example, they become Post 733 if it's 7:33 AM). If this ability resolves at midnight or another time for which a role doesn't exist (like 15:09), your target may choose any role to become instead.
- Choose a player, then use a random ability from a role that starts with the same letter as theirs on them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are immune to even-valued attacks.
- You have a redirect immunity autovest.
- There are two day chats every day.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the Town lose the game.
